short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Planetarium Manager online football manager game Browser Extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PmTrick is browser extension for the Planetarium Manager online football manager game, currently available for Firefox & Google Chrome.

Features
* Advanced tactics helper - Show advanced tactics calculated values directly on the tactic editor's page.
* Show GS on Transfer List and Team Players List
